mapper.select: SELECT com_name AS comName, com_sub_name AS comSubName, com_ceo AS comCeo, com_tel AS comTel, com_url AS comUrl, com_copy AS comCopy, com_auth AS comAuth, com_main_logo AS comMainLogo, com_main_up AS comMainUp, com_main_down AS comMainDown, com_menu AS comMenu FROM grp_company LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE grp_company SET com_name = #{comName}, com_sub_name = #{comSubName}, com_ceo = #{comCeo}, com_tel = #{comTel}, com_url = #{comUrl}, com_copy = #{comCopy}, com_auth = #{comAuth}, com_main_logo = #{comMainLogo}, com_main_up = #{comMainUp}, com_main_down = #{comMainDown}, com_menu = #{comMenu}
